remarks: The vertex degree function on graphs of finite size is a function from vertices to nonnegative integers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Dec-2017.)
statement: vdgrfif $p |- ( ( V e. W /\ E Fn A /\ A e. Fin ) -> ( V VDeg E ) : V --> NN0 ) $.
